text: aur (he nabee!) yaad karo, jab hamane aapase kah diya tha ki aapake paalanahaar ne logon ko apane niyantran mein le rakha hai aur ye jo kuchh hamane aapako dikhaaya,[1] usako aur us vrksh ko jisapar quraan mein dhikkaar kee gayee hai, hamane logon ke lie ek pareeksha bana diya[2] hai aur ham unhen chetaavanee par chetaavanee de rahe hain, phir bhee ye unakee avagya ko hee adhik karatee ja rahee hai
